content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mister [Name]. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Mister [Name]. Based on the information you have provided, I believe that the apartment I am offering could be a great fit for you. I am willing to negotiate the rental price to meet your needs. May I ask what kind of features and amenities you are looking for in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Nothing special, just a clean and comfortable living space. No pets, no smoking, no loud music.

I'm willing to negotiate the rental price. What do you have in mind?
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister [Name]. Based on the information you have provided, I would like to propose a rental price of 300 Euros per month. This price takes into account the location of the apartment, as well as the cleanliness and comfort of the living space. I believe that this price is reasonable and competitive within the local market. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine
